label: diag03_001
prompt: I am so tired of hearing about Brexit

children.label: diag03_002
children.prompt: What is it about Brexit that upsets you?

children.label: diag03_003
children.prompt: There is just so much uncertainty

children.label: diag03_005
children.prompt: Are you concerned how Brexit will affect you personally?

children.label: diag03_006
children.prompt: Yes, I am concerned that it will really damage our economy.

children.label: diag03_004
children.prompt: I just wish we had more unity as a country

children.label: diag03_007
children.prompt: What is it about unity that's important to you?

children.label: diag03_008
children.prompt: I just think everything is better when we all get along.
